shortdesc.ph: Used to set watermark and background image properties.

section.p: Used to set properties of watermark and background images in real-time video.

plentry.pd: HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image. Maximum length is 1024 bytes.
The x-coordinate of the image in the video frame (origin at top-left corner, in pixels).
The y-coordinate of the image in the video frame (origin at top-left corner, in pixels).
Width of the image in the video frame (in pixels).
Height of the image in the video frame (in pixels).

Z-order index of the image.
When using a watermark array to add one or more watermarks, this must be set to a value in the range [1, 255], otherwise the SDK will return an error.
Optional in other cases, valid range is [0, 255], default is 0.
0 means bottom layer, 255 means top layer.

Opacity of the image, range [0.0, 1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Fully opaque.
HTTP or HTTPS address of the image in real-time video. Maximum length is 1024 bytes.
x-coordinate of the image in the video frame (origin is top-left corner, unit: px).
y-coordinate of the image in the video frame (origin is top-left corner, unit: px).
Width of the image in the video frame (unit: px).
Height of the image in the video frame (unit: px).

Z-order index of the image.
When adding one or more watermarks using an array, you must pass a value in the range [1, 255], otherwise the SDK will report an error.
In other cases, you can optionally pass a value in the range [0, 255], default is 0.
0 means bottom layer, 255 means top layer.

Opacity of the image, value range [0.0, 1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Opaque.
